sub_title: Candidate MBA Nyenrode Business University Class of 2024 | Looking for a role in Equity research and Asset management
summary:
Motivated and results-driven professional with a diverse background in entrepreneurship, economics, and finance. Successfully established and expanded a franchise in a challenging environment, showcasing a strong entrepreneurial mindset and ability to seize opportunities. Extensive experience as a subject matter expert in economics, providing valuable insights and support to students worldwide. Recognised for excellence in the field, with a passion for sharing knowledge and contributing to academic growth.

Proven leadership qualities demonstrated through active involvement in community initiatives and as an elected member of a resident welfare association. Committed to making a positive impact and empowering others. Strong background in financial consulting and financial modeling, with a keen eye for detail and a strategic approach to problem-solving.

Seeking opportunities to further develop and grow as a professional through an MBA program at Nyenrode Business University, combining academic rigour with a focus on societal responsibility.

school.name: Renaissance College of Commerce & Management. 45, Anurag Nagar, INdore

profile_positions.description:
As a financial consultant, I provided guidance and advice to clients regarding potential investment opportunities. This involved conducting comprehensive analysis of financial statements, budgets, and other financial reports to identify trends and patterns, as well as assessing the risk and potential returns of various investment options.

In addition to evaluating potential investments, I also monitored and reported on the performance of existing investments held by clients. This involved tracking relevant performance metrics and providing regular updates to clients on their investment portfolios.

To support my analysis, I conducted in-depth assessments of companies, securities, and other assets to determine their fair value. This required a keen understanding of financial markets and economic indicators.

Furthermore, I estimated future cash flows and other key performance indicators of start-ups, real estate properties, and other entities to provide clients with accurate projections of potential returns on investment.

Overall, my role as a financial consultant / analyst required a combination of financial expertise, analytical skills, and the ability to communicate complex financial concepts to clients.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
I have provided comprehensive explanations of economics concepts to a global audience of students hailing from 200 different countries. Additionally, I have coordinated with six different groups, each consisting of 200 individuals, to ensure the daily completion of tasks and the meeting of targets.

Moreover, I have communicated effectively with 30,000 students from five different streams of economics on a diverse range of topics relevant to their area of study. I have also been responsible for guiding new team members in understanding the organization's code of conduct and defining their roles within the team.

As a result of my exemplary performance, I have been featured three times in the company magazine, which highlighted my exceptional client retention rate and impressive approval ratings of 83%. In recognition of my consistent performance, I was awarded the Excellence award.
profile_positions.title: Subject Matter Expert

profile_positions.description:
Coached students pursuing a business degree in Australian and New Zealand universities.
Subjects comprised of economics, finance, and accounting.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for developing and maintaining a diverse clientele comprising banks, insurance companies, public sector undertakings, and e-commerce companies. This involved leveraging my extensive industry network to identify potential business opportunities and build long-term partnerships with key stakeholders.

Additionally, I led a team of 15 individuals to manage logistics operations and address client grievances on a daily basis. Through effective leadership and collaboration, we were able to reduce consignment turnaround and delivery time by more than 30% on average over a sustained period.

In an effort to expand our operations and reach new markets, I successfully led the establishment of an intricate franchise network in three previously non-serviced districts. As a result of our success, I was awarded the prestigious master franchisee status and was tasked with managing six additional franchisees in neighboring districts.

Furthermore, I was instrumental in establishing delivery networks for several e-commerce companies, leveraging my logistics expertise and industry connections to provide efficient and cost-effective delivery solutions.

Overall, my role was characterized by a deep commitment to client satisfaction, a focus on operational excellence, and a passion for driving growth and innovation in the logistics industry.
profile_positions.title: Franchisee

volunteer_experiences.description:
I was responsible for overseeing the delivery of essential services, including water and electric supply, waste recycling, and hygiene management, to the society. Through careful supervision and monitoring, I ensured that all services were delivered efficiently and effectively, meeting the needs and expectations of the community.

In addition to my primary duties, I also worked to bridge the caste and class divide within the society, organizing events and religious festivals that promoted inclusivity and social cohesion. Furthermore, in response to the Covid-19 pandemic, I took proactive measures to ensure the safety and protection of the entire community, promoting the implementation of best practices and protocols that help to reduce the spread of the virus.

Overall, my experience has taught me the importance of effective leadership and management in delivering essential services and promoting social well-being, particularly during times of crisis and uncertainty.
